name: Tick: The Time Based Puzzle Game
description: Test your timing and your patience in this unique casual puzzle game. Set over the backdrop of retro minimalist art style you can choose from 3 different game modes. Play your way through 50 stages of increasing difficult puzzles in Stage Mode. See how fast you really are in Speed Mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: Intel i3+ or AMD equivalent Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800/AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent video card (Dedicated GPU with 512MB+ Video Memory(VRAM)) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or 8 Processor: Intel i5+ or AMD equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800/AMD Radeon HD 5670 or equivalent video card (Dedicated GPU with 512MB+ Video Memory(VRAM)) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: I just picked this up on sale randomly and played a couple of hour  - The games got 2-3 of hours content in it - As far as bugs go reading the other reviews i was expects some, but didnt get any that i noticed - The game is definatly a new puzzler game though  Its not a bad game tbh 6 or 7/10, some more updates will improve that.
